                host = "scidb.smith.edu",

```{sql connection=db}
SELECT ac.carrier, ac.name, AVG(af.dep_delay), af.year, af.month, af.day
FROM airlines.carriers ac
JOIN airlines.flights af
on ac.carrier = af.carrier
WHERE ac.carrier IN ('AA', 'SA', 'DAL', 'UA','FA', 'AA', 'SA', 'JB', 'HA')
GROUP BY ac.carrier
HAVING af.year = 2016 AND af.month = 12 AND af.day = 25; 
```
